text.tspan: rv is the root of a BT(h+1). Its children are
rv is the root of an RT(h+1). Its children are
therefore BT(h+1), and the root was a BT(h+2).
Precondition: the subtree l is black at height h,
the other subtree is non-empty at height h+1.
bal_b applied to the red-rooted tree will return a valid
tree at height h+1. We are done.
Single rotate left. Apply bal_b to the left subtree.
The return state of bal_b() will satisfy the postcondition of
balance(). The violation may still be passed up.
